alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:21AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rapides, west central Evangeline, east central Beauregard and central Allen Parishes through 745 AM CST... At 720 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mittie, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Elizabeth, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Grant, Allen Parish Airport, Harmony, Beaver and Union Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
